section.title: Use a Personal Fork
section.para: Containerized SUSE OpenStack Cloud allows you to use your own fork instead of relying on OpenStack-Helm repositories.

warning.para: If you choose to use different Helm charts, you are on your own.

section.para: To override the Helm chart sources or fork any other code, override the content of the file vars/manifest.yml inside your extravars by defining your own upstream_repos variable.

note.para: You need to define ALL the repositories defined in vars/manifest.yml.
